answer:
Disney Ride Adventure movies had the highest US Gross values. 
Original ScreenPlay movies are the highest grossing and are highly rated on IMDB.
While both Science Fiction and Super Hero Movies were highly rated on IMDB, Science Fiction movies has  a much higher US_Gross value.
Action movies were highly rated on IMDB and had the highest US_Gross values. 
US Gross and Worldwide Gross are closely related for Major Genre and Source.
